TextView.android:text: SerialBot is a simple, powerful, open-source terminal application for your Android device.
It can manage simultaneous Serial, SSH, and Telnet terminal sessions, create secure tunnels, and copy/paste between other apps.
SerialBot is a port of the popular open-source application ConnectBot with added support for Airconsole WiFi to Serial adapters www.get-console.com/airconsole
